metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41751 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in file ecma-builtin-array-prototype.c:909 infunction ecma_builtin_array_prototype_object_slice in Jerryscript beforecommit e1ce7dd7271288be8c0c8136eea9107df73a8ce2 on Oct 20, 2021.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
